testcase.title: Check the display of error message on structure search page

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I sign in with account login "wostesting47@gmail.com" and password "wostesting@47"
I uncheck the indices under the more settings panel
I select search "Structure Search"
I perform search by clicking on "C" from Dotmatics Elemental toolkit
I verify that the error message "No chemistry database is selected. Please select the database(s) and timespan desired for your structure search." is displayed on page "Structure search"

testcase.title: Check that all collections are selected by default in More Settings Page

steps.title: I select collection "All Databases"
I select search "Advanced Search"
I click on link "More Settings" on page "Advanced Search"
I verify that all collections are selected by default under More Settings section on page "Basic Search"

testcase.title: Verify if  "Databases" section in the search history table contains only the list of databases selected in the query statement--Advanced Search

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "All Databases"
I select search "Advanced Search"
I select editions under the "More settings" section
I perform search by query "TS=oil" on page "Advanced Search"
I access page "Results summary" for set "1"
I select "Search History" item of WoS Toolbar menu
I verify that databases in All Databases query statement on "Search History" page is displayed in a given order "Databases= BCI, BIOSIS, CABI, CSCD, CCC"

testcase.title: Verify if "Databases" section in the search history table contains the list of databases selected in a specific order after deselecting all collections--Basic Search

steps.title: I select collection "All Databases"
I select search "Basic Search"
I deselect editions under the "More Settings" panel
I perform search by field "Topic" with query "oil" on page "Basic Search"
I select "Search History" item of WoS Toolbar menu

I verify that databases in All Databases query statement on "Search History" page is displayed in a given order "Databases= CSCD, CABI, WOS, KJD, RSCI, ZOOREC, BIOABS, DRCI, CCC, BCI, DIIDW, FSTA, BIOSIS, INSPEC, MEDLINE, SCIELO"
